verses.verse: M'nasheh <WH4519> was twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> when he began to reign <WH4427> <WH8800>, and he reigned <WH4427> <WH8804> fifty <WH2572> and five <WH2568> years <WH8141> in Yerushalayim <WH3389>:

But did <WH6213> <WH8799> that which was evil <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of the YY <WH3068>, like unto the abominations <WH8441> of the heathen <WH1471>, whom the YY <WH3068> had cast out <WH3423> <WH8689> before <WH6440> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

For he built <WH1129> <WH8799> again <WH7725> <WH8799> the high places <WH1116> which Hizkiyah-yahu <WH3169> his father <WH1> had broken down <WH5422> <WH8765>, and he reared up <WH6965> <WH8686> altars <WH4196> for Baalim <WH1168>, and made <WH6213> <WH8799> groves <WH842>, and worshipped <WH7812> <WH8691> all the host <WH6635> of heaven <WH8064>, and served <WH5647> <WH8799> them.

Also he built <WH1129> <WH8804> altars <WH4196> in the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>, whereof the YY <WH3068> had said <WH559> <WH8804>, In Yerushalayim <WH3389> shall my name <WH8034> be for ever <WH5769>.
And he built <WH1129> <WH8799> altars <WH4196> for all the host <WH6635> of heaven <WH8064> in the two <WH8147> courts <WH2691> of the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>.

And he caused <WH5674> his children <WH1121> to pass through <WH5674> <WH8689> the fire <WH784> in the valley <WH1516> of the son <WH1121> of Hinnom <WH2011>: also he observed times <WH6049> <WH8782>, and used enchantments <WH5172> <WH8765>, and used witchcraft <WH3784> <WH8765>, and dealt <WH6213> <WH8804> with a familiar spirit <WH178>, and with wizards <WH3049>: he wrought <WH6213> <WH8800> much <WH7235> <WH8689> evil <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of the YY <WH3068>, to provoke him to anger <WH3707> <WH8687>.

And he set <WH7760> <WH8799> a carved image <WH6459>, the idol <WH5566> which he had made <WH6213> <WH8804>, in the house <WH1004> of 'Elohim <WH430>, of which 'Elohim <WH430> had said <WH559> <WH8804> to David <WH1732> and to SHlomo <WH8010> his son <WH1121>, In this house <WH1004>, and in Yerushalayim <WH3389>, which I have chosen <WH977> <WH8804> before all the tribes <WH7626> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, will I put <WH7760> <WH8799> my name <WH8034> for ever <WH5865>:

Neither will I any more <WH3254> <WH8686> remove <WH5493> <WH8687> the foot <WH7272> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> from out <WH5921> of the land <WH127> which I have appointed <WH5975> <WH8689> for your fathers <WH1>; so that <WH518> they will take heed <WH8104> <WH8799> to do <WH6213> <WH8800> all that I have commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> them, according to the whole Torah <WH8451> and the statutes <WH2706> and the ordinances <WH4941> by the hand <WH3027> of Mosheh <WH4872>.

So M'nasheh <WH4519> made <WH8582> Y'hudah <WH3063> and the inhabitants <WH3427> <WH8802> of Yerushalayim <WH3389> to err <WH8582> <WH8686>, and to do <WH6213> <WH8800> worse <WH7451> than the heathen <WH1471>, whom the YY <WH3068> had destroyed <WH8045> <WH8689> before <WH6440> the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> to M'nasheh <WH4519>, and to his people <WH5971>: but they would not hearken <WH7181> <WH8689>.

Wherefore the YY <WH3068> brought <WH935> <WH8686> upon them the captains of <WH8269> the host of <WH6635> the king <WH4428> of Ashur <WH804>, which took <WH3920> <WH8799> M'nasheh <WH4519> among the tshofars <WH2336>, and bound him <WH631> <WH8799> with fetters <WH5178>, and carried <WH3212> <WH8686> him to Babylon <WH894>.

And when he was in affliction <WH6887> <WH8687>, he besought <WH2470> <WH8765> the YY <WH3068> his 'Elohim <WH430>, and humbled <WH3665> <WH8735> himself greatly <WH3966> before <WH6440> the 'Elohim <WH430> of his fathers <WH1>,

And prayed <WH6419> <WH8691> unto him: and he was intreated <WH6279> <WH8735> of him, and heard <WH8085> <WH8799> his supplication <WH8467>, and brought him again <WH7725> <WH8686> to Yerushalayim <WH3389> into his kingdom <WH4438>. Then M'nasheh <WH4519> knew <WH3045> <WH8799> that the YY <WH3068> he was 'Elohim <WH430>.

Now after this <WH310> he built <WH1129> <WH8804> a wall <WH2346> without <WH2435> the city <WH5892> of David <WH1732>, on the west side <WH4628> of Gihon <WH1521>, in the valley <WH5158>, even to the entering in <WH935> <WH8800> at the fish <WH1709> gate <WH8179>, and compassed <WH5437> <WH8804> about Ophel <WH6077>, and raised it up <WH1361> <WH8686> a very great height <WH3966>, and put <WH7760> <WH8799> captains <WH8269> of war <WH2428> in all the fenced <WH1219> <WH8803> cities <WH5892> of Y'hudah <WH3063>.

And he took away <WH5493> <WH8686> the strange <WH5236> 'elohim <WH430>, and the idol <WH5566> out of the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>, and all the altars <WH4196> that he had built <WH1129> <WH8804> in the mount <WH2022> of the house <WH1004> of the YY <WH3068>, and in Yerushalayim <WH3389>, and cast <WH7993> <WH8686> them out <WH2351> of the city <WH5892>.

And he repaired <WH1129> <WH8799> the altar <WH4196> of the YY <WH3068>, and sacrificed <WH2076> <WH8799> thereon peace <WH8002> offerings <WH2077> and thank offerings <WH8426>, and commanded <WH559> <WH8799> Y'hudah <WH3063> to serve <WH5647> <WH8800> the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.
Nevertheless <WH61> the people <WH5971> did sacrifice <WH2076> <WH8802> still in the high places <WH1116>, yet unto the YY <WH3068> their 'Elohim <WH430> only.

Now the rest <WH3499> of the acts <WH1697> of M'nasheh <WH4519>, and his prayer <WH8605> unto his 'Elohim <WH430>, and the words <WH1697> of the seers <WH2374> that spake <WH1696> <WH8764> to him in the name <WH8034> of the YY <WH3068> 'Elohim <WH430> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, behold, they are written in the book <WH1697> of the kings <WH4428> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

His prayer <WH8605> also, and how 'Elohim was intreated <WH6279> <WH8736> of him, and all his sin <WH2403>, and his trespass <WH4604>, and the places <WH4725> wherein he built <WH1129> <WH8804> high places <WH1116>, and set up <WH5975> <WH8689> groves <WH842> and graven images <WH6456>, before <WH6440> he was humbled <WH3665> <WH8736>: behold, they are written <WH3789> <WH8803> among the sayings <WH1697> of the seers <WH2374> <WH8676> <WH2335>.

So M'nasheh <WH4519> slept <WH7901> <WH8799> with his fathers <WH1>, and they buried <WH6912> <WH8799> him in his own house <WH1004>: and Amon <WH526> his son <WH1121> reigned <WH4427> <WH8799> in his stead.

Amon <WH526> was two <WH8147> and twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> when he began to reign <WH4427> <WH8800>, and reigned <WH4427> <WH8804> two <WH8147> years <WH8141> in Yerushalayim <WH3389>.

But he did <WH6213> <WH8799> that which was evil <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of the YY <WH3068>, as did <WH6213> <WH8804> M'nasheh <WH4519> his father <WH1>: for Amon <WH526> sacrificed <WH2076> <WH8765> unto all the carved images <WH6456> which M'nasheh <WH4519> his father <WH1> had made <WH6213> <WH8804>, and served <WH5647> <WH8799> them;

And humbled <WH3665> <WH8738> not himself before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068>, as M'nasheh <WH4519> his father <WH1> had humbled <WH3665> <WH8736> himself; but Amon <WH526> trespassed <WH819> more and more <WH7235> <WH8689>.
And his servants <WH5650> conspired <WH7194> <WH8799> against him, and slew <WH4191> <WH8686> him in his own house <WH1004>.

But the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776> slew <WH5221> <WH8686> all them that had conspired <WH7194> <WH8802> against king <WH4428> Amon <WH526>; and the people <WH5971> of the land <WH776> made <WH4427> Yoshiyah-yahu <WH2977> his son <WH1121> king <WH4427> <WH8686> in his stead.
